content:
Zhang Menghua is a member of the School of Energy and Power Engineering, Huazhong University of Science and Technology, majoring in refrigeration and cryogenic engineering. Her research interests include air conditioning system fault diagnosis and building energy consumption prediction based on data mining and deep learning algorithms. She was responsible for the optimization project of the cold and heat source control system of the SAIC Volkswagen Energy Center based on data mining and deep learning algorithms, and participated in the National Natural Science Foundation of China project "Research on Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Fault Diagnosis Methods for Pattern Identification and Integrated Learning under the Big Data Framework"
 Download my resumé. --
summary: Zhang Menghua is a member of the School of Energy and Power Engineering, Huazhong University of Science and Technology, majoring in refrigeration and cryogenic engineering. Her research interests include air conditioning system fault diagnosis and building energy consumption prediction based on data mining and deep learning algorithms.
title: Zhang Menghua

title: Example Talk

summary: Aiming at the problem that the system feedback adjustment caused by the delay of the water chiller reservoir is not timely, thereby increasing the energy consumption of the building, this paper proposes a prediction model of the return water temperature of the chiller based on the artificial neural network. The model includes the use of expert knowledge to set variables, build models, train models, and test the four main steps, and use this to predict the return water temperature after time t after the model is built. The results show that on the basis of the original 11 related variables, the addition of 3 expert variables makes the four models have higher correlation coefficients for predicting the return water temperature. The measured parameters can more accurately predict the return water temperature of the chiller at this time, the mean square error reaches 0.1069, and the R square reaches 0.9923, and this information is used to feedback and adjust the system to solve the delay caused by the reservoir. The adverse effects such as increased energy consumption.
title: The Energy Efficiency Improvement Strategy of Chillers Using Artificial Neural Network Algorithms

summary: In this study, 12 sets of experiments were carried out, and the electronic expansion valve fault data and the compressor normal operation and liquid floodback data were obtained to analyze the fault identification results of different distribution data and target sample data with less and unbalanced data. First of all, this thesis deploys the two-class fault recognition and multi-class fault recognition of variable refrigerant flow systems based on three commonly used deep transfer learning algorithms. They are the migration adaptive enhancement algorithm (TrAdaBoost) , the deep neural network transfer learning algorithm (DNN-TL) and Joint Distributed Adaptation Algorithm (JDA). Then the key parameters of the deep transfer learning model are optimized. Finally, the model is analyzed from evaluation indicators such as accuracy, sensitivity, specificity, and hit rate, and it is combined with the supervised algorithm model, extreme gradient boosting (XGBoost), and deep neural network. (DNN) and convolutional neural network (CNN) for comparison. The results show that, on the one hand, when compared with the traditional supervised learning algorithm model, TrAdaBoost is 46%-51% more accurate than XGBoost. Compared with DNN, DNN-TL increases by 1%-4%. On the other hand, when three different methods of deep transfer learning algorithms compare the results of binary classification and multi-class fault recognition, TrAdaBoost is 2%-9% higher than DNN-TL, and TrAdaBoost is 38%-55% higher than JDA. The overall effect of TrAdaBoost model is slightly better than that of DNN-TL, which indicates that the deep transfer learning model has stronger generalization ability, and has a better diagnostic effect on data tasks with different distributions. Finally, as the size of the training data increases, the accuracy of DNN-TL is about 8% higher than that of DNN. For all training data sizes, especially in the small training data for electronic expansion valve fault identification, the accuracy of TrAdaBoost's model is significantly higher. For DNN-TL, this proves the advantage of TrAdaBoost for transfer learning on small training data.
title: Research on Electronic Expansion Valve and Compressor Liquid Floodback Fault Diagnosis Based on Deep Transfer Learning
Research on Electronic Expansion Valve and Compressor Liquid Floodback Fault Diagnosis Based on Deep Transfer Learning
Energy Consumption Prediction of R&F Wanda Realm Hotel in State Grid Based on Deep Learning Algorithm

content: I am an optimistic and cheerful person, I like to make friends with different people, I like to experience projects and games that I have not played before, and keep my enthusiasm and curiosity about life. As Pushkin said, “If life deceives you, don’t be sad, everything will pass, and what has passed will become cordial nostalgia.” Now, as a student and researcher, I work in the School of Energy and Power Engineering, Huazhong University of Science and Technology. As an engineer, I need to treat our projects with a rigorous attitude. Therefore, I need to invest more time in the laboratory. Therefore, I often adhere to the rhythm of life from coming to work very early to going back to rest very late. In addition to being a researcher, I am also a member of the Red Cross. I will often play with mentally handicapped children so that they can experience more fun; I will also go to the stray cat and dog base to be a responsible “shovel”. Shiguan"; I also participated in various first aid training, and held first aid training activities, popular science first aid knowledge, helping others is my pleasure, because “giving someone a rose, the hand has a lingering fragrance.” To be an ideal scientific researcher is my pursuit. Of course, life also needs adjustment. Outside of research, I am an outgoing person and it is easy to get along with others. I have various hobbies, such as running, cycling, Tai Chi, fitness, jazz, singing, etc.
summary: I am an optimistic and cheerful person, I like to make friends with different people, I like to experience projects and games that I have not played before, and keep my enthusiasm and curiosity about life.
title: Monologue

content: The invention discloses a chiller load forecasting control method and system based on a side-cloud collaborative framework, and belongs to the field of optimized control. The present invention proposes a hierarchical optimization control of chillers using edge computing and cloud computing integration. Real-time load forecasting and division and data preprocessing at the edge, control parameter matrix under different load rates, training and updating of load forecasting models and energy consumption fitting models in the cloud, optimization of chiller control parame ters, using the corresponding models to pass intelligence The optimization algorithm seeks the input of the minimum value of the adaptive function to obtain the optimal control parameter combination. The invention makes full use of edge end resources for data preprocessing and control parameter matrix storage and control parameter transmission, reduces cloud computing pressure and reduces the impact of data transmission delay, so as to achieve the effect of rapid real-time update and optimization control, and can better Fitting the actual operating data, under the condition of meeting the basic load, significantly reducing the energy consumption of the entire system.
summary: The invention discloses a chiller load forecasting control method and system based on a side-cloud collaborative framework, and belongs to the field of optimized control. The present invention proposes a hierarchical optimization control of chillers using edge computing and cloud computing integration. Real-time load forecasting and division and data preprocessing at the edge, control parameter matrix under different load rates, training and updating of load forecasting models and energy consumption fitting models in the cloud, optimization of chiller control parame ters, using the corresponding models to pass intelligence The optimization algorithm seeks the input of the minimum value of the adaptive function to obtain the optimal control parameter combination. The invention makes full use of edge end resources for data preprocessing and control parameter matrix storage and control parameter transmission, reduces cloud computing pressure and reduces the impact of data transmission delay, so as to achieve the effect of rapid real-time update and optimization control, and can better Fitting the actual operating data, under the condition of meeting the basic load, significantly reducing the energy consumption of the entire system.
title: Load Forecasting Control Method and System Of Chiller Based On Side-Cloud Collaborative Framework

authors: Zhenxin Zhou, Huanxin Chen, Gunan Li, Hanlu Zhong, Menghua Zhang
summary: "Data-driven approach has emerged as a popular research method for fault detection and diagnosis (FDD) of variable refrigerant flow system. However, one serious issue has been raised in recent studies, which shows that training classifiers with datasets which suffer of imbalanced class distributions can significantly influence the final classification accuracy. So, aiming at the imbalanced dataset environment problem of variable refrigerant flow (VRF) system based on data-driven fault detect and diagnosis, we conducted a study. First of all, through comparative research, it is concluded that the geometric mean accuracy of the fault detection in the VRF system has reduced an average of 42.49% due to the imbalanced data environment. Then we proposed a Principal Component Analysis-Synthetic Minority Oversampling Technique (PCA-SMOTE) method to save this problem, and verified the reliability and versatility of the proposed method with three types of modeling algorithms commonly used in VRF systems. The result shows that this method not only has obvious improvement effect, but also has strong versatility. In the end, we gradually reduce the number of minority from 50 to 10 to explore minimum fault data requirements of this method. The final result shows that this method can still ensure that common machine learning algorithms can effectively detect and diagnosis the VRF system fault when only 10 fault data are included."
title: Data-Driven Fault Diagnosis For Residential Variable Refrigerant Flow System On Imbalanced Data Environments

authors: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

title: Research on Fault Diagnosis of Compressor Liquid Floodback Based on Deep Neural Network Algorithm

summary: "With the development and popularization of VRF system, the research on the energy efficiency standard of VRF system was gradually deepened. At present, three major energy efficiency standard indexes (SEER, HSPF and IPLV (C)) are closely related to the change rule of environmental temperature. From the perspective of geographical environment, this paper analyzed the influence of different climate regions on the energy efficiency standards in combination with the development of international energy efficiency standards of VRF system. Energy efficiency standard evaluation by zoning is a novel perspective and It is expected that the scholars and enterprises in HVAC field will actively participate in exploring the advantages and disadvantages of standard zoning or non-zoning from the perspective of theory and experiment to jointly promote industrial progress."
title: The Influence of Different Climatic Regions On The Energy Efficiency Standard Index of VRF System

summary: "This paper selected 9 cities in 3 temperature zones (e.g. namely hot summer and warm winter regions, hot summer and cold winter regions and cold regions) as the research objects, and establishes a typical office building model with VRF(Variable Refrigerant Flow) system, and simulates the system load and energy consumption. The energy efficiency of VRF systems in different climate demarcation are evaluated and analyzed. The results show that cooling (heating) load, power consumption, average values of COP(coefficient of performance) and PLR(part load ratio) of VRF systems vary significantly in different climate regions. In hot summer and warm winter areas, the PLR and COP are greater than those in cold areas and in hot summer and cold winter areas. From cold regions to hot summer and warm winter regions, the cooling load and cooling power consumption of the system increase, while the heating load and heating power consumption decrease. The annual average COP difference between cold regions and hot summer and cold winter regions is 0.27, while the difference between hot summer and cold winter regions and hot summer and warm winter regions is 0.59. The result proves that that the evaluation standard for VRF system with demarcation is of research value."
title: Research On Energy Efficiency of Office Buildings VRF System In China

content: Use DBN algorithm to predict hotel energy consumption, and cuckoo search algorithm to optimize. Finally, the average absolute error is 1.05, the mean square error is 1.36, and the coefficient of determination is 0.98.

title: State Key Laboratory of Compressor Technology Open Fund(No.SKL-YSJ201801)

content: The use of deep learning models can detect liquid return failures more efficiently, with an accuracy rate of 99.86%; Compared with the decision tree model with supervised algorithm, there is no need for correlation analysis and pruning process. Compared with the cluster analysis algorithm model of unsupervised algorithm, there is no need for correlation and principal component analysis process. The processing process is simple and easy to operate and efficient; Use Keras to build a deep neural network model; Compared with support vector machines, neural networks, and random forest algorithms, the process of building deep neural network models is simple and efficient;
summary: The use of deep learning models can detect liquid return failures more efficiently, with an accuracy rate of 99.86%; Compared with the decision tree model with supervised algorithm, there is no need for correlation analysis and pruning process.
title: Optimization Analysis of Training Data for Fault Diagnosis of Refrigeration System Based On Dynamic Recognition and Cluster Analysis(No.51576074)

content: •	The use of deep learning models can detect liquid return failures more efficiently, with an accuracy rate of 99.86%; •	Compared with the decision tree model with supervised algorithm, there is no need for correlation analysis and pruning process. porridge = "blueberry" if porridge == "blueberry": print("Eating...")   Math In-line math: $x + y = z$
Block math:
$$ f\left( x \right) = ;\frac{{2\left( {x + 4} \right)\left( {x - 4} \right)}}{{\left( {x + 4} \right)\left( {x + 1} \right)}} $$
 Fragments Make content appear incrementally
{{% fragment %}} One {{% /fragment %}} {{% fragment %}} **Two** {{% /fragment %}} {{% fragment %}} Three {{% /fragment %}}  Press Space to play!
One  Two  Three 
 A fragment can accept two optional parameters:
 class: use a custom style (requires definition in custom CSS) weight: sets the order in which a fragment appears   Speaker Notes Add speaker notes to your presentation
{{% speaker_note %}} - Only the speaker can read these notes - Press `S` key to view {{% /speaker_note %}}  Press the S key to view the speaker notes!
 Only the speaker can read these notes Press S key to view    Themes  black: Black background, white text, blue links (default) white: White background, black text, blue links league: Gray background, white text, blue links beige: Beige background, dark text, brown links sky: Blue background, thin dark text, blue links    night: Black background, thick white text, orange links serif: Cappuccino background, gray text, brown links simple: White background, black text, blue links solarized: Cream-colored background, dark green text, blue links   Custom Slide Customize the slide style and background

title: Slides

content: The invention discloses a CO2 automobile air conditioner with waste heat driven absorption refrigeration and auxiliary subcooling. The high-temperature tail gas exhaust pipe of the internal combustion engine of the present invention is connected to the generator, the refrigerant vapor outlet of the generator, the condenser, the throttle valve one, and the refrigerant inlet of the evaporator one are connected in sequence, and the refrigerant outlet of the evaporator one, the absorber, and the The solution pump and the solution inlet of the heat exchanger are connected in sequence, and the solution outlet of the heat exchanger is connected to the generator; the refrigerant outlet of the generator is connected to the refrigerant inlet of the heat exchanger, and the refrigerant outlet of the heat exchanger is connected to the absorber through the second throttle valve. ; The compressor outlet is connected to the throttle valve through the gas cooler and connected to the compressor inlet. The present invention is to cool the CO2 at the outlet of the gas cooler, the evaporation temperature of which is higher, higher than the evaporation temperature of the CO2 system, and the two systems are coordinated and matched with each other to jointly improve the overall efficiency of the cycle.
summary: The invention discloses a CO2 automobile air conditioner with waste heat driven absorption refrigeration and auxiliary subcooling. The high-temperature tail gas exhaust pipe of the internal combustion engine of the present invention is connected to the generator, the refrigerant vapor outlet of the generator, the condenser, the throttle valve one, and the refrigerant inlet of the evaporator one are connected in sequence, and the refrigerant outlet of the evaporator one, the absorber, and the The solution pump and the solution inlet of the heat exchanger are connected in sequence, and the solution outlet of the heat exchanger is connected to the generator; the refrigerant outlet of the generator is connected to the refrigerant inlet of the heat exchanger, and the refrigerant outlet of the heat exchanger is connected to the absorber through the second throttle valve. ; The compressor outlet is connected to the throttle valve through the gas cooler and connected to the compressor inlet. The present invention is to cool the CO2 at the outlet of the gas cooler, the evaporation temperature of which is higher, higher than the evaporation temperature of the CO2 system, and the two systems are coordinated and matched with each other to jointly improve the overall efficiency of the cycle.
title: A Waste Heat-Driven Absorption Refrigeration Auxiliary Subcooled CO2 Automobile Air Conditioner

content: The invention discloses a CO2 marine refrigeration system with absorption and thermoelectric refrigeration in cooperation with auxiliary subcooling. The solution outlet of the absorber of the present invention is connected to the solution inlet of the generator through a solution pump, the refrigerant vapor outlet of the generator is connected to the second refrigerant inlet of the evaporator through a condenser and a pressure reducing valve, and the second refrigerant outlet of the evaporator is connected to the absorber; The absorber is connected through a throttle valve; the compressor outlet, gas cooler, thermoelectric subcooler, evaporator two, expander and evaporator one inlet are connected in sequence, and the evaporator one outlet is connected to the compressor inlet; the power manager is connected to the expansion separately Machine and thermoelectric supercooler. The invention can cool the CO2 at the outlet of the gas cooler by recycling the waste heat and pressure, is easy to realize, and can reduce its temperature below the ambient temperature, and can significantly reduce the irreversible loss in the high-pressure CO2 throttling process
summary: The invention discloses a CO2 marine refrigeration system with absorption and thermoelectric refrigeration in cooperation with auxiliary subcooling. The solution outlet of the absorber of the present invention is connected to the solution inlet of the generator through a solution pump, the refrigerant vapor outlet of the generator is connected to the second refrigerant inlet of the evaporator through a condenser and a pressure reducing valve, and the second refrigerant outlet of the evaporator is connected to the absorber; The absorber is connected through a throttle valve; the compressor outlet, gas cooler, thermoelectric subcooler, evaporator two, expander and evaporator one inlet are connected in sequence, and the evaporator one outlet is connected to the compressor inlet; the power manager is connected to the expansion separately Machine and thermoelectric supercooler. The invention can cool the CO2 at the outlet of the gas cooler by recycling the waste heat and pressure, is easy to realize, and can reduce its temperature below the ambient temperature, and can significantly reduce the irreversible loss in the high-pressure CO2 throttling process.
title: CO2 Marine Refrigeration System With Subcooling Assisted By Absorption and Thermoelectric Refrigeration

content: The invention discloses a CO2 automobile air conditioning system based on waste heat and pressure combined with auxiliary subcooling. The CO2 automobile air conditioning system of the present invention includes a compressor, an evaporator, a gas cooler, a throttle valve, a thermoelectric generator, a thermoelectric subcooler, a thermoelectric generator and an engine; the evaporator outlet is connected to the compressor inlet, and the compressor outlet is connected to gas cooling The inlet of the gas cooler and the outlet of the gas cooler are connected to the inlet of the thermoelectric subcooler, the outlet of the thermoelectric subcooler is connected to the inlet of the throttle valve, the outlet of the expander is connected to the inlet of the evaporator; the outlet of the engine gas pipe is connected to the thermoelectric generator, and the expander is connected to the power manager, power management The generators are respectively connected to the thermoelectric subcooler and the thermoelectric generator. The invention uses the temperature difference between the high-temperature tail gas and the ambient air to output electric energy, which is used to drive the thermoelectric supercooler and improves the utilization rate of energy.
summary: The invention discloses a CO2 automobile air conditioning system based on waste heat and pressure combined with auxiliary subcooling. The invention uses the temperature difference between the high-temperature tail gas and the ambient air to output electric energy, which is used to drive the thermoelectric supercooler and improves the utilization rate of energy.
title: A CO2 Automobile Air-Conditioning System Based On Waste Heat And Pressure Combined With Auxiliary Subcooling

content: The invention discloses a CO2 automobile air conditioning system based on waste heat and supercooling. The CO2 automobile air conditioning system of the present invention includes a compressor, an evaporator, a gas cooler, a throttle valve, a thermoelectric generator, a thermoelectric subcooler, a thermoelectric generator and an engine; the evaporator outlet is connected to the compressor inlet, and the compressor outlet is connected to gas cooling The inlet and outlet of the gas cooler are connected to the inlet of the thermoelectric subcooler, the outlet of the thermoelectric subcooler is connected to the inlet of the throttle valve, and the outlet of the throttle valve is connected to the inlet of the evaporator; the outlet of the engine gas pipe is connected to a thermoelectric generator, and the power manager is connected to the thermoelectric subcooler respectively. And thermoelectric generator. The invention uses the temperature difference between the high-temperature tail gas and the ambient air to output electric energy, which is used to drive the thermoelectric supercooler and improves the utilization rate of energy.

content: •	This project uses a combination of simulation and experiment to study the airflow field of the cold storage, mainly studying the airflow field between the fruit box and the fruit box after the fruit box is placed in the cold storage. •	This project establishes a three-dimensional physical model, uses Ansys Icem CFD software for structural meshing, uses Fluent software for solving calculations, and uses Tecplot software for post-processing, and finally obtains the simulation content. •	The simulation of this project mainly studies the distribution of the airflow field between the fruit bins when the apples are pre-cooled. The boundary conditions in the simulation are measured experimentally.
summary: This project uses a combination of simulation and experiment to study the airflow field of the cold storage, mainly studying the airflow field between the fruit box and the fruit box after the fruit box is placed in the cold storage.
title: Project of Tianjin University of Commerce - Research on Air Distribution Law of Cold Storage
